# Why R?

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(rfortherestofus)

tribble(
  ~service,
  ~price,
  "Custom Template",
  10000,
  "Sample Code",
  1000,
  "Custom R Package",
  5000,
  "Training",
  2500
) |>
  janitor::adorn_totals() |>
  rfortherestofus_table() |>
  cols_width(
    service ~ "50%",
    price ~ "25%"
  ) |>
  cols_label(service = "Service", price = "Price") |>
  fmt_currency(
    columns = price,
    decimals = 0
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    locations = cells_body(rows = 5),
    cell_text(weight = "bold")
  )
```

# R for the Rest of Us Client Service Agreement

​​Thank you for your interest in R for the Rest of Us, a company focused on teaching the most powerful tool for working with data, even to those who have never coded before. We will always do our best to meet your expectations. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out.  We pride ourselves with not only providing quality services, but by being effective communicators.  The following terms and conditions will help make sure we are on the same page.

This Agreement, is by and between David Keyes Consulting LLC, an Oregon Limited Liability Company whose corporate address is 3519 NE 15th Avenue, Suite #167 Portland, OR 97212 (“DKC”), and Wellspring Philanthropic Fund, whose address is 10 Times Sq New York, NY 10018(“Client”). Client has read and understands the foregoing consent to participate in said Services. If Client has any questions concerning the content, policies or procedures regarding the Services it will discuss same with DKC.

**3. Mutual Confidentiality and Respectful Communication**. The parties agree to hold each other's Confidential Information in strict confidence.
